dmca.title: File "Unauthorized Download" under "U," Brittanica complains
dmca.body:
Dear Sir or Madam: 

Please be advised that at http://yutcng.blogspot.com/2005/10/encyclopaedia-britannica-2006-ultimate.html appears to be a copy of a work copyrighted by  Encyclopaedia Britannica, Inc. 

2. The complete Encyclopaedia Britannica 2006 Ultimate Reference Suite appears to be available for an unauthorized download. 

3. Please contact William J. Bowe, Executive Vice President and General Counsel,  Encyclopaedia Britannica, Inc, [private], Chicago, IL 60610, 312[private], 312[private] (fax) or via email at [private]@eb.com. for any further information. 

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.

5. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
 
Very truly yours, 
[private]
Executive Vice President and General 
Counsel
dmca.sender_name: Executive Vice President and General Counsel
